notes.suttacentral_structure: SuttaCentral bilara-data uses JSON files with segment IDs as keys. Each file contains translation segments for a specific sutta.

traditions.Theravada: Pali Canon - oldest Buddhist texts, focused on individual liberation
traditions.Mahayana: Later Buddhist tradition emphasizing compassion and bodhisattva path
traditions.Vajrayana: Tantric Buddhism, especially prominent in Tibet, uses mantras and visualizations

major_sutras_not_included.Diamond_Sutra: Available in CBETA Chinese Buddhist corpus (cbeta-org/xml-p5)
major_sutras_not_included.Lotus_Sutra: Available in CBETA Chinese Buddhist corpus (cbeta-org/xml-p5)
major_sutras_not_included.Lankavatara_Sutra: Available in CBETA Chinese Buddhist corpus (cbeta-org/xml-p5)
major_sutras_not_included.Vimalakirti_Sutra: Available in CBETA Chinese Buddhist corpus (cbeta-org/xml-p5)

data_format_notes.suttacentral_json: Format: {"segment_id": "English text", ...}. Example: {"mn1:1.1": "So I have heard."}
data_format_notes.chinese_txt: Format: Alternating lines of Pinyin and Chinese characters. Line 1: Title in Pinyin, Line 2: Title in Chinese
